common.projectForbiddenOperation: As a project you are not able to proceed with this operation

patronMode.patronModeSignatureMessage: Signing this message will {{state}} patron mode for address {{address}}.
patronMode.firstParagraph:
This mode is for token holders
who want to support Octant.
patronMode.secondParagraph: It disables and removes all personal allocations and project donations.
patronMode.thirdParagraph: All rewards go directly to the matching fund with no action required by the patron. Learn more in the <0>Docs</0>.
patronMode.fourthParagraphEnable:
Slide the switch below all the way to
the right to enable patron mode.
patronMode.fourthParagraphDisable:
Slide the switch below all the way to
the left to disable patron mode.

allocationInfoBoxes.decisionWindowClosed: The decision window is now closed. Allocating funds is not possible.
allocationInfoBoxes.connectWallet: In order to manipulate allocation values and vote, please connect your wallet first.

allocationSummary.tooltip: <0>Leverage</0> shows the multiplier effect of your donation to the projects you chose. Note that leverage will fluctuate significantly and might be very different at the end of the allocation window.

allocationInputsRewardsAvailable.resetAllocations: Reset allocations to manually edit this project

boxGlmLock.tooltipText: Effective lock (EL) is the part of your locked GLM that is currently earning rewards. Equal to your current balance, if that is unchanged during the ongoing epoch. Increase lock & EL increases proportionally to epoch time remaining. Decrease lock & this amount is removed from EL for the epoch.

budgetBox.approve2Transactions: Please approve 2 transactions in your wallet. The first (required only once and for locking) allows ERC-20 tokens, and the second locks / unlocks GLM.
budgetBox.stakeWillUpdate: Your stake will update when the transaction is confirmed
budgetBox.waitingForTransactionHash: Waiting for transaction hash from Etherscan...

donors.donationsNotEnabled: Donations are not enabled in this epoch

success.text: Your locked balance will update after tx confirmation. <0>View on Etherscan</0>

notApproved.label: Please approve two wallet transactions
notApproved.text: One to allow ERC-20 tokens, the other to deposit GLM.

historyList.emptyHistory: You haven’t made any transactions yet

tos.text: I agree to the <0> Terms of Service </0>

withdrawEth.withdrawalsDistributedEpoch: Withdrawals are distributed when Epoch {{currentEpoch}} ends

meta.description: Octant is a platform for experiments in decentralized governance that reward participation.

confirmChanges.title: Please confirm your allocation to keep your changes

text.desktop: Add projects and use the slider to divide rewards between yourself and your chosen projects
text.mobile: Add projects and use the slider to divide rewards between yourself & your chosen projects

withdrawEth.title: Withdraw ETH
withdrawEth.text: Rewards you allocate to yourself can be withdrawn to your wallet here in the Earn view

connectWallet.text: Please connect your wallet to Octant in order to participate in this and future epochs

lockGlm.title: Lock GLM to earn
lockGlm.text: Lock GLM tokens for as long as possible to earn ETH rewards you can donate or withdraw

allocateYourRewards.title: Allocate your rewards
allocateYourRewards.textDesktop: Unallocated rewards will be swept back for restaking at the end of this allocation window, so don't forget to allocate!
allocateYourRewards.textMobile: Unallocated rewards will be swept back for restaking at the end of this allocation window

connectWalletTip.title: Connect your wallet
connectWalletTip.text: To see your own personal stats here, <0/>you will need to connect your wallet

usingTheApp.text: Before we can go any further, please read the terms of service and click the checkbox below to agree with them.

welcomeToOctant.text:
To get started, lock some GLM in the <0>Earn view, and take a look at the projects you can donate to in the <0>Projects view.

If you already have GLM locked, you’ll have some rewards to use during E2 Allocation window, which runs from 17 to 31 Jan.

earnRewards.text:
ETH rewards are earned based on a weighted average, so the more GLM you lock and the longer you lock it for, the more you earn.

You can unlock at any time. Use the calculator in the <0>Earn view to work out the return per epoch on a given amount of GLM.

donateToProjects.text:
Check out the lineup for Epoch 1 in the <0>Projects view. Tap a project tile to read its details. Help your favourite projects out by donating to them.

Your donation will be fund-matched by Golem Foundation. Just tap the heart to add a project to the <0>Allocate view where you can donate.

slideIt.text:
Once you have rewards, use the slider in the <0>Allocate view to easily divide rewards between projects or yourself.

To change your choices at any time during allocation, just click Edit, make some changes and reconfirm in your wallet.

welcomeToOctant.text:
To get started, lock some GLM in the <0>Earn view, and see how the Epoch 1 projects performed in the Epoch 1 archive.

If you made personal allocations in the previous epoch, your ETH will be available to withdraw in the <0>Earn view.

earnRewards.text:
Use the <0>Earn view calculator to work out your return per epoch for any amount of GLM. You can unlock your tokens at any time.

If you already have GLM locked, you will have some rewards to use during Epoch 2 allocation which will begin in late January 2024.

getInvolved.text:
Epoch 2 projects will start appearing in the app after a 2-3 week cooling off period. Get involved and suggest a project in our Discord.

Once projects are shortlisted, a community vote on Snapshot decides which projects enter this epoch. All participating voters get a POAP.

project.loadingProblem: Loading of this project encountered a problem.

tip.title: Add your favourites
tip.text: Save projects to the Allocate view with the heart icon so you can donate rewards to them

settings.cryptoMainValueDisplay: Use crypto as main value display
settings.patronModeTooltip: Patron mode is for token holders who want to support Octant. It disables allocation to yourself or projects. All rewards go directly to the matching fund with no action required by the patron.

syncStatus.information:
We're synchronizing things to prepare the
next epoch, so the app will be unavailable
for a little while. Please check back soon.
